alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 10:29AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern St. Louis, northern Carlton, southwestern Lake and northwestern Douglas Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1028 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Boulder Lake, to near Pike Lake Near Duluth, to Cloquet, to near Cromwell, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hermantown, Thomson, Boulder Lake, Island Lake and Pike Lake Near Duluth around 1035 AM CDT. Proctor, Mahtowa and City of Rice Lake around 1045 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Oliver, Superior, French River, Two Harbors, Wrenshall, Wisconsin Point, Larsmont, South Range, Stoney Point and Knife River. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore
